Edited November 19, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''

I liked how in that episode the reason the asteroid showed up on such short notice is because it changed course suddenly (aliens?) rather than because their detection methods sucked.

Anyone else notice that One Punch Man seems to take place on a different planet, as evidenced by the continents shown on the orbital map screen? I guess they just coincidentally built their own ISS xD

[I]this[/I] series [I]this[/I] episode ; ) hehe kinda something like [I]that[/I] yup yup hehe ; )

nice touch for sure ; )
